1585600.name: Himeko Sutori Soundtrack
1585600.description:
This is the soundtrack from Himeko Sutori, with music by acclaimed composers Kevin Won, Chris Lane, and Vasco Grossmann. This DLC contains 30 tracks (in either mp3 or high-quality wav format) highlighting the world-spanning locales, tactical combat, and deep emotions to be found in Himeko Sutori.

The soundtrack includes the track "Journey's Awakening ~ Prelude," performed by a live orchestra at Lyndhurst Hall, AIR Studios, with Kevin Won conducting.
